row._Details:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE Content [ <!ATTLIST Content Erstellungsdatum CDATA "xx.xx.xxxx" > <!ATTLIST Content Ersteller CDATA "BLxxxxx/EXxxxxx" > ]> <Content Ersteller="BLxxxxx/EXxxxxx" Erstellungsdatum="xx.xx.xxxx">Freier Dokumentationstext
</Content>

row.process:
:SET &FIBU_FLAG# = &FIBU_FLAG# :SET &BUCH_PER# = &BUCH_PER# :SET &LDATE# = SYS_LDATE("JJJJMMTT") :SET &LDATEMINUS1M# = SUB_PERIOD ("JJJJMMTT:&LDATE#","MM;1","JJJJMMTT") :SET &LYEAR# = SUBSTR(&LDATEMINUS1M#, 1, 4) :SET &LMONTH# = SUBSTR(&LDATEMINUS1M#, 5, 2)
:IF &BUCH_PER# = "" : SWITCH &FIBU_FLAG# : CASE "M13" : SET &BUCH_PER# = "&LYEAR#13" : CASE "JAB" : SET &BUCH_PER# = "&LYEAR#12" : OTHER : SET &BUCH_PER# = "&LYEAR#&LMONTH#" : ENDSWITCH :ENDIF :PRINT "BUCHPER = &BUCH_PER#"
:SET &PROGRAM# = "BBS.BatchCharger.sh" :SET &OPTIONS# = "-b bbsbatch_monatsabschluss --buchPer &BUCH_PER#" :SET &RUNDIR# = ""
:INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB
